email_body: can you send it through lavo. he's suppose to pay for it. thanks, john Liz M Taylor 02/09/2001 09:16 AM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: Super Bowl Hi Johnnie, I think you may have encrypted your reply about the reimbursement of the air fare from the Super Bowl. I was unable to read your response. Please send again. Liz
